pattern.title: External attribute use has data definition

rule.context: xs:attribute[some $ref-namespace in namespace-uri-from-QName(resolve-QName(@ref, .)), $import in ancestor::xs:schema[1]/xs:import satisfies ( xs:anyURI($import/@namespace) = $ref-namespace and exists(@appinfo:externalImportIndicator))]
rule.assert: Rule 9-57: An external attribute use MUST be a documented component with a non-empty data definition.
